nodes.message: Inital tags are set on this object

nodes.text: Hmmm... someone has scrawled, "Very Dangerous - Please Do Not Enter" in chalk on the lower half of the door.
So far, the entrances in this Wine Cellar have been iron gates rather than solid wooden doors. Wonder why this one is different?
And why did someone in very neat handwriting put the message, "Very Dangerous - Please Do Not Enter" so low to the ground? Must have written it in shorthand.
The door is very solid despite the many scratches. The hinges are rusty, but the oil I put on them should help.
It's a very solid door with rusty hinges, and it is locked. No kicking this one in...
As if kicking any door down is a good idea (particularly one with a 'Danger' sign).
The door is locked.
This looks like an older version of a Drew class lock. That means I am supposed to be able to open this by now.
Well, I can tell it's a lock and it's old, but I clearly fail my 'basic locks identification' check. I guess I need to study more.
I'll just have to oil the hinges and work off some of the rust...
There... that should do it. But do I feel lucky?
That's a great idea!
If only I had bought some oil...
Okay, here I go into danger...
Really scary unknown danger with big teeth...
So, remind me again, why am I doing this? Um... Er...
I guess I'd spend the rest of my life wondering about it and feeling like a coward for not finding out.
Never let it be said that I'm a coward. Foolish, maybe, but a coward, nah.
Noooo... after all this, the hinges are rusted shut!
The door hinges are rusted shut. I'm going to need something to get the hinges to slide again.
So here I go bravely into the dark, dangerous unknown...
And, of course, the door is locked. So much for getting up my nerve and facing my fears...
That seems like it should have worked, but it's like something is blocking the door shut from the other side. I'll have to work on it some other night.

nodes.message: Shawn cannot unlock this until after Esme Proach event in Store

nodes.text: That seems like it should have worked, but it's like something is blocking the door shut from the other side. I'll have to work on it some other night.
Stupid old lock. I'm just not quite getting it.
That's it! Now all I have to do is face an unknown and very scary dangerous thing!
Oh... right. Is that what I signed up for?
Bleh. This is a really tough lock.
If only I had lockpicks...
If I concentrate really hard, maybe I can hear something other than the scurrying of Drats on the other side.
Nope, I'm not hearing any Drat sounds in the other room. It's really quiet in there.
Too quiet...
This is a thick door and even thicker walls. If there's anything behind it, I can't quite make it out.
Maybe I hear something on the other side... but maybe not.
The door isn't magical, but there's a faint essence of powerful magic on the other side.
Odd, I think that there's some magic nearby, but I can't tell for sure.
I can't sense any magic around here now.
